title: Banned for third party software
body:
I was banned today for "using a third party software" when i was at school.
I came from school going on my pc and UN-minimizing my League client i saw i was disconnected from the sever with a message on the screen telling me i have disconnected so i closed league to restart it again but while i was closing it i saw the word banned, So i relaunch my league client to see i was banned for "third party software".

I have not played a league match since yesterday and OCE.OP.GG doesn't say ive played a match today, Only 1 of my friends know the password to my account and it highly unlikely they got me banned.

The only Third party software I've ever used was MKJOGO for the custom skins (didnt use the jungle timer) but i got a warning for using it so i stopped but now i didnt get a warning just a perma ban.

Im not sure what third party software i was using only thing that is on when i play league is Shadowplay, Discord and youtube nothing that "interfere's" with the game so i'm just wondering why i got banned and what "Third party software" i was using.


P.S. I have the last 5 Minutes of my desktop when i got home and seeing the banned message (From shadowplay)

EDIT: Found out the reason why most people got banned was for MkLoL which i used 5 months ago and uninstalled after i was warned.

Why did riot wait 5 MONTHS until they send a perma ban for a software that gives you CLIENT SIDE SKINS its just so saddening that after using $80 dollars on a game to get banned for using a software (Which Btw didn't know was illegal until 24Hr ban. Riot you have a alert system use it people don't check there emails) that i stoppped using when told that it was illegal is just such a bad practice to use as a company.

I've made a ticket only getting bot responses {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

EDIT 2 : I got unbanned the help support ticket said i got a false ban.

replies.body: Same thing happened to me a few hours ago. I used MKJOGO in January and received a 24 hour ban. Uninstalled it. 4 months later, I am permanently banned.

hey the same thing happened to me two hours ago , except I have never used anything that is remotely called a hack or anything at all !, I used TeamSpeak and that's it . Please help on how to fix this ,permanent ban for nothing and I have never even got a warning ever for this !!
